list.name: Time region for panel # Live Threads

targets.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "process_cpu_usage" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "system_cpu_usage" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])

SELECT SUM(val) FROM (SELECT mean(value) AS val FROM jvm_memory_max WHERE $timeFilter AND area = 'heap' AND "service.name" =~ /^$service/ GROUP BY time($__interval),*) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT SUM(val) FROM (SELECT mean(value) AS val FROM jvm_memory_committed WHERE $timeFilter AND area = 'heap' AND "service.name" =~ /^$service/ GROUP BY time($__interval),*) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT SUM(val) FROM (SELECT mean(value) AS val FROM jvm_memory_used WHERE $timeFilter AND area = 'heap' AND "service.name" =~ /^$service/ GROUP BY time($__interval),*) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

stackedPeak = () => {
peak = from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "jvm_threads_peak" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])

live = from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "jvm_threads_live" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])
  

  
return join(tables:{live:live, peak:peak},on:["_time","_stop","_start", "host"])
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        _value: (r._value_peak - r._value_live),
        _measurement: "peak"
    }))
}

stackedPeak()

peak = from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "jvm_threads_peak" AND

|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])

stackedPeak()
SELECT "gauge" FROM "jvm_gc_live_data_size" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/)
SELECT "gauge" FROM "jvm_gc_live_data_size" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/)
SELECT SUM("counter") FROM "jvm_gc_memory_allocated" WHERE ("service.name" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT SUM("counter")  FROM "jvm_gc_memory_promoted" WHERE ("service.name" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "jvm_classes_loaded" AND
    r.service == "$service" AND
    r._field == "gauge")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "service"])
  |> last()

SELECT SUM(val) FROM (SELECT mean(value) AS val FROM jvm_memory_max WHERE $timeFilter AND area = 'nonheap' AND "service.name" =~ /^$service/ GROUP BY time($__interval),*) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT SUM(val) FROM (SELECT mean(value) AS val FROM jvm_memory_committed WHERE $timeFilter AND area = 'nonheap' AND "service.name" =~ /^$service/ GROUP BY time($__interval),*) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT SUM(val) FROM (SELECT mean(value) AS val FROM jvm_memory_used WHERE $timeFilter AND area = 'nonheap' AND "service.name" =~ /^$service/ GROUP BY time($__interval),*) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT SUM("counter") FROM "jvm_gc_pause" WHERE ("service.name" =~ /^$service$/ AND "action" = 'end of minor GC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT SUM("counter") FROM "jvm_gc_pause" WHERE ("service.name" =~ /^$service$/ AND "action" = 'end of major GC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "jvm_classes_unloaded" AND
    r.service == "$service" AND
    r._field == "gauge")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "service"])
  |> last()
